mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver exceptional public works consulting services that drive sustainable infrastructure development. We are committed to providing effective and efficient solutions while prioritizing social-economic factors and environmental responsibility.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading public works engineering consulting firm in Laos, recognized for our expertise, integrity, and contribution to national development through sustainable infrastructure projects.

projects.heading: Our Projects
projects.subheading: Explore our portfolio of successful construction consulting projects
projects.empty: No projects found in this category.

national_road_1e_lot1.summary: Major road construction supervision project for National Road 1E (Lot I) in Bolikhamxay Province, involving comprehensive construction oversight and quality control.
national_road_1e_lot1.description: One of our largest infrastructure projects, providing construction supervision for National Road 1E (Lot I) with a value of over 4.5 billion Kip. Our team of 8 engineers provided comprehensive construction oversight, materials testing, quality control, and progress reporting over 47 months from 2012 to 2017.

national_road_1e_lot2.summary: Construction supervision for National Road 1E (Lot II) featuring double surface treatment road construction in Bolikhamxay Province.
national_road_1e_lot2.description: Complementing our work on Lot I, this project involved supervising the construction of National Road 1E (Lot II) with a value of 1.6 billion Kip. Our 3-engineer team ensured quality control and compliance with MPWT technical specifications over 32 months.

mekong_bank_protection_paksan.summary: Mekong River bank protection construction project in Paksan District, protecting 1.52 km of riverbank infrastructure.
mekong_bank_protection_paksan.description: Critical river bank protection project safeguarding communities and infrastructure along the Mekong River. Our team supervised the construction of 1.52 km of bank protection in Phoxai Village, ensuring environmental compliance and structural integrity over 5 years.

concrete_bridges_road8.summary: Construction supervision for 4 concrete bridges on National Road No. 8, ensuring structural integrity and safety compliance.
concrete_bridges_road8.description: Major bridge infrastructure project involving the construction supervision of 4 concrete bridges on National Road No. 8. Our engineering team ensured compliance with technical specifications and safety standards throughout the construction process.

nam_ngeip_hydroelectric.summary: Specialized topographic survey for Nam Ngeip 1 Hydroelectric Project re-regulation dam, funded by Japan.
nam_ngeip_hydroelectric.description: International project providing specialized surveying services for the Nam Ngeip 1 Hydroelectric Project. Our team conducted comprehensive topographic mapping and leveling surveys for the re-regulation dam area, working with Japanese funding and international standards.

road_construction_vientiane.summary: Multiple road construction and supervision projects across Vientiane Province, including double bitumen surface treatment.
road_construction_vientiane.description: Comprehensive road development projects across Vientiane Province, including the construction supervision of roads from Ban Thaxan to Ban Nanin and from Pakkayoung to Naxanglek Village. These projects involved advanced double bitumen surface treatment techniques and rigorous quality control.

founder.name: Mr. Bounlieng Thephachanh
founder.title: Founder & Managing Director
founder.bio: With over 30 years of experience in public works engineering, Mr. Thephachanh founded TPEC after extensive international experience including education in Germany and consulting work with Swedish companies SKANSKA, HIFAB, and Sweroad. He has led capacity building initiatives for Department of Public Works and Transportation staff across all provinces of Lao PDR.
founder.education: Road-Bridge Construction Engineering graduate from Germany (1981)
experience: Road-Bridge Maintenance Supervisor, State Enterprise No.1 Company (1982)
Head of Planning Department, Water Road Construction Enterprise
Chief of Construction Division, Road No.13 Construction Company (1985)
International training in Thailand for road-bridge supervision and construction
Trainer and Consultant with SKANSKA subsidiary (Swedish construction company)
Senior Consultant with HIFAB (Swedish consulting company)
Local Consultant with Sweroad Consultant Company (2001)
Nationwide capacity building for Department of Public Works and Transportation staff across all provinces of Lao PDR
founder.description: Founded by Mr. Bounlieng Thephachanh, our company is built on over 30 years of engineering excellence and industry expertise. Our founder brings extensive international experience and has been instrumental in developing infrastructure consulting capabilities across Laos.

vice_president.name: Ms. Sengdavanh Thepphachanh
vice_president.title: Vice President
vice_president.bio: Dr. Sengdavanh Thepphachanh brings advanced expertise in hydraulic and environmental engineering to TPEC. With a Doctor of Engineering degree from Technische Universität Dresden and extensive research experience, she leads our environmental compliance and sustainable engineering initiatives.
vice_president.education: Doctor of Engineering in Hydraulic Engineering, Technische Universität Dresden (2019-2022); Master's degree in Environmental Engineering, University of the Philippines Diliman (2013-2015)
experience: Scientific Researcher, Technische Universität Dresden (Apr 2023 - Present)
Lecturer/Researcher, National University of Laos (NUOL) (Dec 2015 - Aug 2019)
vice_president.description: Dr. Sengdavanh Thepphachanh serves as Vice President, bringing cutting-edge expertise in hydraulic modeling, environmental engineering, and sustainable development. Her international education and research background strengthen TPEC's technical capabilities in environmental compliance and innovative engineering solutions.

technology_advisor.name: Mr. Matthew Thaokhamlue
technology_advisor.title: Technology Advisor
technology_advisor.bio: Technical Product Manager with 5+ years in B2B SaaS, focusing on AI features and API integrations for health analytics and lab software. He brings expertise in product management, AI solutions, and technical integration to support TPEC's digital transformation initiatives.
technology_advisor.education: Master of International and Development Economics, Hochschule für Technik und Wirtschaft Berlin; Bachelor's Degree in Economics, Chiang Mai University
experience: Product Manager, Labforward GmbH, Berlin (Nov 2024 - Present)
Technical Product Manager, LabTwin GmbH, Berlin (Jan 2023 - Nov 2024)
Product Owner, Thryve GmbH, Berlin (Oct 2019 - Dec 2022)
technology_advisor.description: Mr. Matthew Thaokhamlue serves as Technology Advisor, bringing modern expertise in product management, AI implementation, and digital solutions. His international experience in B2B SaaS and technical product development supports TPEC's technology advancement and digital transformation initiatives.
